monster.name: Aberrant Spirit
monster.languages: Deep Speech, understands the languages you know

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 40 + 10 for each spell level above 4

trait.name: Regeneration (Slaad Only)
trait.text: The spirit regains 5 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

trait.name: Whispering Aura (Mind Flayer Only)
trait.text: At the start of each of the spirit's turns, the spirit emits psionic energy if it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, each creature (other than you) within 5 feet of the spirit. Failure: 2d6 Psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Claw (Slaad Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Slashing damage, and the target can't regain Hit Points until the start of the spirit's next turn.

action.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 150 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Slam (Mind Flayer Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Psychic damage.

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Tiny, Small, Medium, Large, Huge

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 10 (Medium or smaller), 20 (Large), 40 (Huge)

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: Force damage equal to 1d4 + 3 + your spellcasting ability modifier (Medium or smaller), 2d6 + 3 + your spellcasting ability modifier (Large), or 2d12 + 3 + your spellcasting ability modifier (Huge).

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ape makes two Fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock (Recharge 6)
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 25/50 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 plus your Wisdom modifier

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 plus five times your Ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your Ranger level)

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

action.name: Beast's Strike
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage (your choice when you summon the beast). If the beast moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target before the hit, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage of the same type, and the target has the Prone condition if it is a Large or smaller creature.

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 plus your Wisdom modifier

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 plus five times your Ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your Ranger level)

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The beast can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

action.name: Beast's Strike
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning or Piercing damage (your choice when you summon the beast), and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC equals your spell save DC).

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 plus your Wisdom modifier

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 4 plus four times your Ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your Ranger level)

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The beast doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

action.name: Beast's Strike
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d4 + 3 plus your Wisdom modifier Slashing damage.

monster.name: Bestial Spirit
monster.speed: 30 ft., climb 30 ft.(Land only), fly 60 ft.(Air only), swim 30 ft.(Water only)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 20 (Air only) or 30 (Land and Water only) + 5 for each spell level above 2

trait.name: Flyby (Air Only)
trait.text: The spirit doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
trait.text: The spirit has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the spirit's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

trait.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
trait.text: The spirit can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel Piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bear makes two Rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

trait.name: Bloodied Fury
trait.text: While Bloodied, the boar has Advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage. If the boar moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) Piercing damage and, if it is Large or smaller, has the Prone condition.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The bear makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the Prone condition if it is Huge or smaller.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Jumper
trait.text: The cat's jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.

action.name: Scratch
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.

monster.name: Celestial Spirit
monster.languages: Celestial, understands the languages you know

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + the spell's level + 2 (Defender only)

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 40 + 10 for each spell level above 5

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 600 ft. Hit: 2d6 + 2 + summonSpellLevel Radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Radiant damage, and the spirit can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains 1d10 Temporary Hit Points.

action.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
action.text: The spirit touches another creature. The target regains Hit Points equal to 2d8 + summonSpellLevel.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
action.text: Strength Saving Throw: DC 12, one Medium or smaller creature the snake can see within 5 feet. Failure: 7 (3d4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12).

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 40 + 15 for each spell level above 4

trait.name: Heated Body (Metal Only)
trait.text: A creature that hits the spirit with a melee attack or that starts its turn in a grapple with the spirit takes 1d10 Fire damage.

trait.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)
trait.text: When a creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the spirit, the spirit can target it with magical energy if the spirit can see it. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, the target. Failure: Until the start of its next turn, the target can't make Opportunity Attacks, and its Speed is halved.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of Slam attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel Bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Berserk Lashing (Clay Only)
reaction.text: Trigger: The spirit takes damage from a creature. Response: The spirit makes a Slam attack against that creature if possible, or the spirit moves up to half its Speed toward that creature without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12). While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The wolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Prone condition if it is Huge or smaller.

monster.name: Draconic Spirit
monster.languages: Draconic, understands the languages you know

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 14 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 50 + 10 for each spell level above 5

trait.name: Shared Resistances
trait.text: When you summon the spirit, choose one of its Resistances. You have Resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half the spell's level (round down), and it uses Breath Weapon.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Attack: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 10 feet. Hit: 1d6 + 4 + summonSpellLevel Piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon
action.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: 2d6 damage of a type this spirit has Resistance to (your choice when you cast the spell). Success: Half damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Elemental Spirit
monster.speed: 40 ft., fly 40 ft.(hover; Air only), burrow 40 ft.(Earth only), swim 40 ft.(Water only)
monster.resist: lightning, thunder (Air only); piercing, slashing (Earth only); acid (Water only)
monster.languages: Primordial, understands the languages you know

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 50 + 10 for each spell level above 4

trait.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)
trait.text: The spirit can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without it counting as Difficult Terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of Slam attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d10 + 4 + summonSpellLevel Bludgeoning (Earth only), Cold (Water only), Lightning (Air only), or Fire (Fire only) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The elephant makes two Gore attacks.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage. If the elephant moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target also has the Prone condition.

action.name: Trample (bonus action)
action.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 5 feet that has the Prone condition. Failure: 17 (2d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the elk moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) Bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the Prone condition.

monster.name: Fey Spirit
monster.languages: Sylvan, understands the languages you know

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 12 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 30 + 10 for each spell level above 3

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of Fey Blade attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Fey Blade
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Force damage.

action.name: Fey Step (bonus action)
action.text:
The spirit magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the spirit's chosen mood:
Fuming: The spirit has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.
Mirthful: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, one creature the spirit can see within 10 feet of itself. Failure: The target is Charmed by you and the spirit for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.
Tricksy: The spirit fills a 10-foot Cube within 5 feet of it with magical Darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Fiendish Spirit
monster.speed: 40 ft., climb 40 ft.(Demon only), fly 60 ft.(Devil only)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 12 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 50 (Demon only) or 40 (Devil only) or 60 (Yugoloth only) + 15 for each spell level above 6

trait.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
trait.text: When the spirit drops to 0 Hit Points or the spell ends, the spirit explodes. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the spirit. Failure: 2d10 plus this spell's level Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

trait.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
trait.text: Magical Darkness doesn't impede the spirit's Darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The spirit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical eff ects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Bite (Demon Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the spirit can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Fiery Strike (Devil Only)
action.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. or range 150 ft. Hit: 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Fire damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The frog's Long Jump is up to 10 feet and its High Jump is up to 5 feet with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) Piercing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 11). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the goat moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the Prone condition.

monster.name: Giant Insect
monster.speed: 40 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 40 ft.(Wasp only)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 30 + 10 for each spell level above 4

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The insect can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Poison Jab
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 10 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Piercing damage plus 1d4 Poison damage.

action.name: Web Bolt (Spider Only)
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 60 ft. Hit: 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Bludgeoning damage, and the target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of the insect's next turn.

action.name: Venomous Spew (Centipede Only) (bonus action)
action.text: Constitution Saving Throw: Your spell save DC, one creature the insect can see within 10 feet. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the insect's next turn.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The seahorse can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage, or the seahorse deals 11 (2d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage if it moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

action.name: Bubble Dash (bonus action)
action.text: While underwater, the seahorse moves up to half its Swim Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5 , reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

action.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the spider can see within 60 feet. Failure: The target has the Restrained condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage, or the goat deals 2 (1d4) Bludgeoning damage if it moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
trait.text: Magical Darkness doesn't impede the imp's Darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The imp has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Invisibility
trait.text:
The imp casts Invisibility on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
At will: Invisibility

action.name: Sting
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: The imp changes into a form that resembles a rat (Speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it's wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The imp reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The lion has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

trait.name: Running Leap
trait.text: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The lion makes two Rend attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of Roar.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

action.name: Roar
action.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature within 15 feet. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of the lion's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage, and the target has the Prone condition if it is Large or smaller.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
trait.text: The mule counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Compression
trait.text: The octopus can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without spending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Ink Cloud (1/Day)
reaction.text: Trigger: A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater. Response: The octopus releases ink that fills a 5-foot Cube centered on itself, and the octopus moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 10 + 1 per spell level

trait.name: Type
trait.text: Choose: celestial, fey, fiend

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + 10 per spell level (the steed has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to the spell's level)

trait.name: Life Bond
trait.text: When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you're within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Otherworldly Slam
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + summonSpellLevel of Radiant (Celestial), Psychic (Fey), or Necrotic (Fiend) damage.

action.name: Fell Glare (Fiend Only; Recharges after a Long Rest) (bonus action)
action.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the end of your next turn.

action.name: Fey Step (Fey Only; Recharges after a Long Rest) (bonus action)
action.text: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.

action.name: Healing Touch (Celestial Only; Recharges after a Long Rest) (bonus action)
action.text: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 + summonSpellLevel.

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The owl doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The panther makes one Pounce attack and uses Prowl.

action.name: Pounce
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage, or the panther deals 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage if it had Advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Prowl
action.text: The panther moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end of this movement, the panther can take the Hide action.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Pseudodragon
monster.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The pseudodragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The pseudodragon makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.

action.name: Sting
action.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pseudodragon can see within 5 feet. Failure: 5 (2d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. Failure by 5 or More: The Poisoned target also has the Unconscious condition until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Invisibility
trait.text:
The quasit casts Invisibility on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
At will: Invisibility

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the quasit's next turn.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: The quasit changes into a form that resembles a bat (Speed 10 ft., Fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., Climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., Swim 40 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it's wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The quasit reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Scare (1/Day)
action.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, one creature within 20 feet. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically

trait.name: Agile
trait.text: The rat doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The shark has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sting
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

monster.name: Skeleton
monster.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 80/320 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The sphinx has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Radiant damage.

reaction.name: Burst of Ingenuity (2/Day)
reaction.text: Trigger: The sphinx or another creature within 30 feet makes an ability check or a saving throw. Response: The sphinx adds 2 to the roll.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the spider knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

trait.name: Invisibility
trait.text:
The sprite casts Invisibility on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
At will: Invisibility

action.name: Needle Sword
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage.

action.name: Enchanting Bow
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +6, range 40/160 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the start of the sprite's next turn.

action.name: Heart Sight
action.text: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 10, one creature within 5 feet the sprite can see. Celestials, Fiends, and Undead automatically fail the save. Failure: The sprite knows the target's emotions and alignment.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The tiger makes one Pounce attack and uses Prowl.

action.name: Pounce
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the tiger had Advantage on the attack roll, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) Slashing damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the Prone condition.

action.name: Prowl
action.text: The tiger moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end of this movement, the tiger can take the Hide action.

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: equals your Proficiency Bonus

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 11 + the spell's level

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 30 (Ghostly and Putrid only) or 20 (Skeletal only) + 10 for each spell level above 3

trait.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
trait.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, any creature (other than you) that starts its turn within a 5-foot Emanation originating from the spirit. Failure: The creature has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
trait.text: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 Force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Necrotic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 150 ft. Hit: 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Necrotic damage.

action.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel Slashing damage. If the target has the Poisoned condition, it has the Paralyzed condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the horse moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the Prone condition.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The wolf has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage, and the target has the Prone condition if it is Medium or smaller.

monster.name: Zombie
monster.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
trait.text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.
